alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 10 at 11:31AM EDT until May 12 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Michigan... Sturgeon River near Alston affecting Baraga and Houghton Counties. ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Michigamme River near Crystal Falls (Michigamme) affecting Iron County. ...The Flood Advisory is cancelled for the following rivers in Michigan... Sturgeon River near Nahma Junction affecting Delta County. .Recent rain and snowmelt have resulted in high water levels. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Elevated river levels caused by excessive rainfall and recent snowmelt are occurring. * WHERE...Sturgeon River near Alston. * WHEN...From this morning to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Homes and structures along the low lying areas and numerous roads become impacted by flood water. In Houghton County...Sturgeon River Road...Aho Road...and Rajala Road are impacted. In Baraga County...Sturgeon Road...Halonen Road and Usitalo Road are impacted. Along Froberg Road...Tahtinen Road... Irwin Road...Oliver Road...and Shirley Road are impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 7.6 feet this evening. - Action stage is 7.5 feet. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Report observed flooding to the National Weather Service in Marquette and local emergency services when you can do so safely. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by tonight at 1000 PM EDT /0900 PM CDT/.
